awards.text: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Film based on life of actress Gertrude Lawrence, on- and offstage, takes the opportunity to feature extravagant musical production numbers with 'Julie Andrews' , acting, singing and dancing.

title: Star!
